name: Simplicity (TimelyDev)
description:
Simplicity is a 1-bit platformer with 8 levels. The game is still in development. This game is only made by me. This is my first downloadable game ever. The game will get bug fixes just comment if there are any bugs. Also tell me witch level It's on.

Patch notes: Exit during game play and bug fixes.
Read the install instructions if you want the better version then the HTML one.
Instructions: Use the A to go left or D to go right or just us the Arrow keys. Press space to jump. Hit ESC to exit during game play
